title: First Time Home Buyers Program
description: Reduces or eliminates the amount of Property Transfer Tax (commonly referred to as PTT) when you purchase your first home. Find out more and see if you qualify by clicking the learn more button below.

description: This tax credit offers a $5,000 non-refundable amount when you file your tax return the following year. The credit offers you up to $750. To find out if you are eligible, speak to your accountant and see additional information by clicking the learn more button below.

title: RRSP Home Buyers Plan (HBP)
description: HBP is a program designed to assist first-time buyers in purchasing their first property by giving you the ability withdraw up to $25,000 (or $50,000 combined with your partner) in a single year from your RRSP to be used towards the purchase of a qualifying property. Find more information and see if you can qualify by clicking the button below.
